meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jay Malarcher Amy Winograd Friedman Nancy Feinstein Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #990.

td.p: Jay Malarcher, a teacher from New Orleans, Louisiana
Amy Winograd Friedman, a business librarian originally from Lexington, Massachusetts
Nancy Feinstein, an emergency room nurse and travel agent from Petaluma, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $9,400)

tr.td: U.S. HISTORY
SHOW MUSIC
DAYS OF THE WEEK
DANCE
FAMOUS COUSINS
ONOMATOPOETIC WORDS
(Alex: And of course, those are words whose sound they denote.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_5_5', 'clue_J_5_5_stuck', '(Nancy: Who is Prince Albert?)
(Alex: No, sorry. You had to go to the other part of Europe; the other end of Europe. "Who was [*]?" Alright, that cost you $800, you\'re now tied with Amy at $1,200, and we\'re out of the Jeopardy! round. Jay\'s still in the lead, but we\'ll see what happens in Double Jeopardy!, and that should be very interesting. We\'ll get to it right after this.)

Czar Nicholas II

Nancy
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_5_5', 'clue_J_5_5_stuck', 'In 1894, shortly after ascending the throne, he married his distant cousin, a German princess named Alix')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_3_5', 'clue_DJ_3_5_stuck', '(Jay: What is Environment?)
(Amy: What is the Environmental Protection Agency?)
[Nancy shakes her head]
(Alex: Nancy doesn\'t want to try it? What is [*]?" [The end-of-round signal sounds] Nancy, you get to select, but you won\'t have time to do that, and so we have a much closer finish than was the case or would\'ve been the case a few minutes ago. Amy still in the lead, but by only $400 over Nancy; Jay in good shape with $2,800. Remember, the player with the most cash at the end of Final Jeopardy! goes home with the money and returns on Monday as our returning champion; the runners-up receive these prizes:)

the Department of Education

AmyJay
Triple Stumper
')
